description: This course introduces students to digital strategies. Even though companies have been subject to successive shocks such as the industrial and computing revolutions, technology and innovation management has remained critical for their product strategy, differentiation, and competitiveness. Today, however, digital corporations (such as Google, Amazon, Facebook, Alibaba, Uber, Netflix, Bitcoinâ€¦) are changing this status quo and revolutionizing business. They have few products but many services, and they connect people to one another. This module introduces students to digital strategies and prepares them to think of innovation in a digital context, and export this to their organizations to engage in disruptive transformation.
title: Digital Strategy
prerequisite:
(1)BSP1703 Managerial Economics or BSP1707 Managerial Economics: Exposure
(2)BSP2701 Global Economy
